UPDATE.CLOSE_THE_APP_TO_UPDATE: Close completely the app or the browser to install the update

AUTH.EMAIL_HINT: The email address you used to register
AUTH.REGISTRATION_EMAIL_HINT: Choose an email address to use
AUTH.REGISTER_A_NEW_ACCOUNT_TO_THE_SYSTEM: Register a new account to the system
AUTH.HAVEN_T_RECEIVED_CONFIRMATION_LINK: I haven't received the confirmation link
AUTH.HAVEN_T_RECEIVED_CONFIRMATION_LINK_HINT: If you haven't received the confirmation link yet, repeat the procedure
AUTH.RESEND_CONFIRMATION_LINK_HINT: Insert your username and we will send you another code at the email address you provided us; please check also your SPAM folder
AUTH.RESEND_LINK_HINT: Resend the confirmation link to your email address
AUTH.PASSWORD_POLICY_VIOLATION: The password must be at least {{ n }} characters long
AUTH.REGISTRATION_COMPLETED: Registration completed; confirm your email to login
AUTH.CONFIRM_YOUR_EMAIL_TO_LOGIN: Before to login you have to confirm the email address you provided; check in your inbox or into the SPAM folder
AUTH.PASSWORD_RESET_HINT: Type in your email to request a password reset
AUTH.RESET_MY_PASSWORD_HINT: You will receive an email containing a code to reset your password
AUTH.ALREADY_HAVE_A_RESET_CODE: I already have a reset code
AUTH.ALREADY_HAVE_A_RESET_CODE_HINT: If you already have a reset code, go on and change your password
AUTH.BACK_TO_SIGN_IN_HINT: Go back to the sign in page
AUTH.CHANGE_THE_PASSWORD_HINT: Note: the password should consist of {{ n }} characters or more
AUTH.RESET_CODE_HINT: The code you received by email after the reset request
AUTH.HAVEN_T_RECEIVED_A_RESET_CODE: I haven't received the reset code yet
AUTH.HAVEN_T_RECEIVED_A_RESET_CODE_HINT: If you haven't received your reset code yet, repeat the procedure
AUTH.PASSWORD_RESET_CODE_SENT: The code to reset the password has been sent via email
AUTH.PASSWORD_CHANGED: Password changed! Now you can sign in again
AUTH.CONFIRM_PASSWORD_ERROR: User not found, code not correct or password too short
AUTH.YOU_NEED_TO_CHOOSE_A_NEW_PASSWORD: Choose a new password for your account
AUTH.CONFIRM_NEW_PASSWORD_HINT: Confirm the chosen password and continue
AUTH.AGREEMENTS_CHECK_REGISTRATION: By creating my account, I accept

CUSTOM_FIELDS.CHOOSE_A_KEY: Choose a name for the field
CUSTOM_FIELDS.DUPLICATED_KEY: A field with that name already exists
CUSTOM_FIELDS.NAME: Name
CUSTOM_FIELDS.FIELD_DELETION_ALERT: The field will be irreversibly deleted

RESOURCE_CENTER.VERSION_ATTACHED_IS_OLDER: The resourse has been updated since it was attached

ATTACHMENTS.UPLOADING_ATTACHMENT_WARNING: Loading the attachment, don't change page

ECHO.GO_TO_HOME_HINT: Click to go to the homepage of the service
ECHO.EMAIL_CHANGED: Email address successfully updated. You now have to sign-in again.
ECHO.ACCOUNT_CONFIRMED: Account confirmed: you can now sign-in.
ECHO.GITHUB_SOURCE_INTEGRATION_SUCCESS: GitHub has been connected. You can now complete the configuration.
ECHO.GITHUB_SOURCE_INTEGRATION_ERROR: Error during the integration of GitHub; try again.
ECHO.TRELLO_SOURCE_INTEGRATION_SUCCESS: Copy and paste the following token in the previous page to complete the configuration: {{token}}
ECHO.TRELLO_SOURCE_INTEGRATION_ERROR: Error during the integration of Trello; try again.
ECHO.EXTERNAL_CALENDARS_SOURCE_INTEGRATION_SU: The external account is now linked. Go back to the calendars page to complete the configuration
ECHO.EXTERNAL_CALENDARS_SOURCE_INTEGRATION_ER: Error while linking the external account; try again

ADDRESS.ADDRESS_HINT: Street address, P.O. box, company name, c/o
ADDRESS.ADDRESS2_HINT: Apartment, suite, unt, building, floor, etc.

OFFLINE.FEATURES_REDUCED_CONTENTS_NOT_UP_TO_DATE: Functionality is reduced and contents may be not up to date
OFFLINE.ERROR_DURING_LAST_SYNC: There was an error during last synchronisation; please try again.
OFFLINE.UPLOAD_QUEUE_REQUESTS_EXPLANATION: Resources created offline must be uploaded online
OFFLINE.DOWNLOAD_RESOURCES_EXPLANATION: List of the resources available offline
OFFLINE.REQUEST_FAILED: Request failed; try again or cancel the request
OFFLINE.HUGE_SYNC_NEED_MANUAL_CONFIRMATION: There is a lot of data to synchronise. Confirm to proceed.

TEAMS.YOU_NEED_A_TEAM_TO_CONTINUE: You need a team to continue
TEAMS.TEAM_NOT_ACTIVATED_DISCLAIMER: Team has not been activated yet; contact an administrator
TEAMS.INVITE_USER_HINT: Invite a member to the team
TEAMS.CAN_MANAGE_TEAM: The user can edit the team settings and manage the team members
TEAMS.IS_OWNER: The user is the current owner of the team
TEAMS.PENDING_INVITATION: The user has been invited in the team but hasn't accepted yet
TEAMS.USER_NOT_FOUND_OR_ALREADY_JOINED: Invitation failed; make sure the user isn't part of the team yet
TEAMS.MAIN_EXPLANATION: The users in your team. You can manage their permissions and add new users
TEAMS.DELETION_OPERATION_FAILED: Operation failed; make sure the user doesn't have active memberships in other services

ACCOUNT.SET_A_NEW_EMAIL: Change the email address; requires your current password
ACCOUNT.UPDATE_EMAIL_EXPLANATION: The new email address won't be active until you confirm it
ACCOUNT.UPDATE_EMAIL_FLOW_EXPLANATION: We sent an email to the new address: follow the procedure to confirm the changes
ACCOUNT.INVALID_EMAIL: The email address inserted is not valid
ACCOUNT.SET_A_NEW_PASSWORD: Change the password; requires the current password
ACCOUNT.INVALID_PASSWORD: The password should be at least {{n}} characters long
ACCOUNT.OPERATION_FAILED_PASSWORD: Operation failed; is the password you typed correct?
ACCOUNT.USER_DELETION_ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure? The operation is irreversible!!
ACCOUNT.YOU_MUST_LEAVE_ALL_TEAMS_FIRST: Before to proceed, you have to leave all the teams you joined

APPOINTMENT.TITLE: Title
APPOINTMENT.LOCATION_HINT: Add a location for the appointment
APPOINTMENT.ALL_DAY_HINT: If set, the appointment won't have a specified time in the day
APPOINTMENT.CALENDAR_HINT: Choose the calendar in which to insert the appointment
APPOINTMENT.FORM_HAS_ERROR_TO_CHECK: One or more configurations have values which are not allowed; check and try again

CALENDARS.PRIVATE_CALENDARS_HINT: These calendars and their appointments are visible only to you
CALENDARS.TWAM_CALENDARS_HINT: These calendars and their appointments are visible to the whole team
CALENDARS.PRIVATE_CALENDAR_HINT: The calendars and its appointments are visible only to you
CALENDARS.TWAM_CALENDAR_HINT: The calendar and its appointments are visible to the whole team
CALENDARS.NAME: Name
CALENDARS.COLOR_HINT: Supported HEX and RGB (preview on the right)
CALENDARS.CREATE_PRIVATE_OR_TEAM: Do you want to create a private or a team-shared calendar?
CALENDARS.DO_YOU_WANTO_LINK_TO_EXTERNAL_SERVICE: Do you want to link the calendar to an external service?
CALENDARS.DO_YOU_WANTO_LINK_TO_EXTERNAL_SERVICE_HI: Note well: you can't change this configuration later
CALENDARS.DONT_LINK_HINT: The calendar won't be synchronised with any external service
CALENDARS.LINK_TO_HINT: Synchrnonise the appointments with an external calendar
CALENDARS.DELETE_CALENDAR_HINT: Warning! The calendar and its appointments will be deleted in an irreversable operation!
CALENDARS.CALENDAR_NOT_YET_LINKED_HINT: The calendar isn't linked to the external service yet: select the calendar and proceed with the operation
CALENDARS.DO_YOU_WANT_PROCEED_LINKING_OR_DELETE: Do you want to try again to link the calendar or you wish to delete it?
CALENDARS.LINKING_CALENDAR_CONFIRM_ONCE_DONE: Follow the procedure of the external service and confirm here once done
CALENDARS.CHOOSE_AN_EXTERNAL_CALENDAR_TO_LINK: Choose an external calendar to link
CALENDARS.FIRST_SYNC_MAY_TAKE_A_WHILE: First sync in progress (it may take a while)...
CALENDARS.BASED_ON_EXTERNAL_SERVICE_SHARING_PERMIS: From sharing permissions of the external service

SUBSCRIPTION.MAIN_EXPLANATION_TEAMS: With our free plan you have access to all the features of Horace and you can create as many teams as you like; however, to invite more than two users to your teams, you have to choose one of the following plans.
SUBSCRIPTION.MAIN_EXPLANATION_USERS: With our free plan you can collect data from one source and use one custom field for your tracks;  to connect up to three sources, take advantages of three custom fields and customize your reports, subscribe to our Gold plan.
SUBSCRIPTION.CALCULATION_METHOD: The number of users is calculated by counting all the distinct users across all the teams you created.
SUBSCRIPTION.HOW_IT_WORKS_APPLE: Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the App Store after purchase.
SUBSCRIPTION.DO_YOU_CONFIRM_THE_SUBSCRIPTION_: Do you confirm you want to subscribe to: {{plan}}?
SUBSCRIPTION.SUBSCRIPTION_WONT_RENEW_ANYMORE: The subscription won't be renew after its due. Do you confirm?

STRIPE.NO_CREDIT_CARD_INFO_STORED_IN_OUR_SERVER: Note: no Credit/Debit Card information will be stored in our servers
STRIPE.YOU_ARE_SUBSCRIBING_TO_RECURRING_PLAN: You are subscribing to the following recurring plan
STRIPE.AUTHORIZATION_CHECK_TEXT: to send instructions to the financial institution that issued my card to take payments from my card account in accordance with the terms of the service.
STRIPE.SUBSCRIBE_HINT: Subscribe to the selected plan with the credit/debit card information specified
STRIPE.INVALID_CREDIT_CARD: The card you inserted seems to be invalid
STRIPE.ERROR_DURING_PAYMENT_CHECK_CARD: The payment was refused: check the information provided
STRIPE.SUCCESSFULLY_SUBSCRIBED: You subscribed to the plan chosen
